mapper.delete: delete from t_followed where followed_user_id=#{followeId.id} and user_id=#{userId.id}
mapper.select: select * from t_followed where user_id=#{userId.id} and followed_user_id=#{followeId.id}

select u.id,u.username,u.headshot, fu.id fid,fu.username fusername,fu.headshot fheadshot, f.create_time from t_followed f left join t_user u on u.id = f.user_id left join t_user fu on fu.id = f.followed_user_id where user_id=#{userId.id};

select u.id,u.username,u.headshot, fu.id fid,fu.username fusername,fu.headshot fheadshot, f.create_time from t_followed f left join t_user u on u.id = f.user_id left join t_user fu on fu.id = f.followed_user_id where followed_user_id=#{followeId.id};
